attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WORKERS FROM ABROAD SHOULD BE STOPPED FROM TAKING OUR JOBS

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name. Also, please do not use BLOCK CAPS as they are mor difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
